item.title: Tracking who Trump is appointing to fill key administration roles
item.description: Follow President Trump’s progress filling over 800 positions, among about 1,300 that require Senate confirmation, in this tracker from The Washington ...

item.title: Lee Hamilton, foreign policy leader in Congress, dies at 94
item.description: President Barack Obama called the Indiana Democrat “one of the most influential voices on international relations and American national security.”

item.title: Supreme Court clears way for California voting map that bolsters Democrats
item.description: The Supreme Court allowed a new California voting map that could help Democrats gain up to five seats in Congress.

item.title: Mexican cartel scion, wanted in journalist’s death, sentenced to 5 years
item.description: Mexico has sought Damaso Lopez Serrano’s extradition since 2020, charging him with ordering the killing of Javier Valdez, an award-winning journalist ...
